skills.name: ETERNAL FLAME
desc: • Deal true damage to all enemies.
• Inflict Physical Burn, Magic Burn and True Burn on all enemies for 2 turns.
• 25% Chance to Steal All Beneficial Effects from all enemies.

skills.name: SOULS OF THE DAMNED
desc: • Deal true damage to all enemies.
• Reduce Max HP on all enemies by 20%.
• 35% Chance to inflict Silence on all enemies for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to inflict Curse on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: NUMBER OF THE BEAST
desc: • Deal true damage to all enemies.
• Inflict 3 stacks of Fear on all enemies for 5 turns.
